<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Migrate icon field to new reference icon field of design system icon table.</description>
        <name>Migrate Declarative Action Icon Field</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_declarative_action_assignment");
      gr.query();
      while (gr.next()) {
        var iconName = gr.getValue("icon");
        var iconSysId;
        var vr = new GlideRecord("st_sys_design_system_icon");
        vr.addQuery("name", iconName);
        vr.query();
        if (vr.next()) {
            iconSysId = vr.getUniqueValue();
            gr.setValue("design_icon", iconSysId);
            gr.setWorkflow(false);
            gr.update();
        }
      }
]]></script>
